item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi There, Thank you for visiting my blog. Myself, Raja Kesari, a mainframe/COBOL guy with 12+ years of experience of working in Cards and Payments area specialized in Authorizations. With keen interest on Emerging technolgies, I started learning Blockchain and Distributed Ledger Technolgy. I started my journey with a certification program(mentioned below) from IIIT,Hyderabad. This has given me the neccessary introduction of decentralized ledger tech spanning many basic concepts of blockchain tech.
